General.Name: STS Evermedia Corporation
General.Description: STS Evermedia Corporation provides engineering, logistics, information technology, program management, technical design, and security services to government sector and private commercial enterprises. It offers fiber optic security, surveillance systems, personnel/vehicle access control, and emergency planning services. The company was formerly known as Cambodian Ventures Ltd. and changed its name in March 2007. STS Evermedia Corporation was founded in 2006 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts. STS Evermedia Corporation operates as a subsidiary of The Evermedia Group, Inc.
General.Address: 60 State Street, Boston, MA, United States, 02109
